application_details.description: The part utilizes Bi-directional Evolutionary Structure Optimization (BESO) to achieve a great topological structure. The final part adopts a hollow lattice fill structure with a wall thickness of 3.5mm, which reduces the weight by 20% compared to the original hollow die-casting aluminum alloy solution, with improvements in both appearance and performance.
